products.title: Rimini, Miami Yellow - Roller Blind
products.description: Well, the name says it all. The rimini's miami yellow is bright, funky, and summery. Due to its lightweight but sturdy fabric, it has a surprising level of opaqueness, despite its light colour. Not that you'll notice, with the colour of sunshine in your window. This is the ideal hue for creating a sunny, cheery kitchen, or a fun, energetic home office. Pair with creams and pretty florals for some country chic, or with sky blue shades for a fun, summery feel.

products.title: Spectrum, Energy Yellow - Venetian Blind
products.description: When it comes to the spectrum's energy yellow, the name really does say it all. A bright, bold, and lively shade of yellow that simply refuses to be missed, this gloss finish, aluminium slatted blind is sure to make a statement wherever it's used. Add fun and cheer to a child's bedroom, where the energy yellow will work hard to pull out complementary colours from playful patterned wallpapers and primary coloured furniture.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Yellow - Roller Blind
products.description: The soft sunshine of the palermo (blackout) yellow will add a cheery freshness to a window, even when it's doing its job of blocking out the outside light. Add to that the superior quality of the sleek blackout fabric and you have the perfect window covering. Use this blind in a modern country kitchen for both function and style; paired with other pastels and pretty florals, your window covering will give the room a summery, airy feel.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Yellow - Vertical Blind
products.description: The soft, pastel hue of the palermo (blackout) yellow will bring colour and sunshine wherever it goes. When the sun is out, and the blind is open, they will serve only to accent each other, creating a gorgeous glow in your home. The yellow will work best with other pastels, or with whites, and can be used to add a subtle infusion of warm colour to an otherwise neutral room. Choose it for your home office or entry hallway for a distinctly pretty flush of colour.

products.title: Capella, Golden Shimmer - Roller Blind
products.description: When the sun is shining you become fascinated with the myriad ways in which it dances with colours that had never shown a hint of life before. Capella golden shimmer allows you to celebrate that natural beauty all year round with its clever use of luxurious golden threads and timeless floral patterning. Take your decor further towards the luxury end of the spectrum and something magical happens. You feel like you can do anything with your decor, and become inspired to find finishing touches that will speak volumes.

products.title: Ferns, Gold - Roller Blind
products.description: Ferns in sand is the dreamy and relaxing fabric you have been searching for, and it's now available as a classic roller blind. The causal way in which the ferns twist and turn on the fabric, catching the light in different ways as they go is testament to the refined subtlety of the design. Transforming the guest bedroom used to be the job that would never end, but those days are now a thing of the past.

products.title: Watercolour, Gold - Roller Blind
products.description: When you're looking for a contemporary design that will fill any space, watercolour gold could be just what you need. The subtle way in which the greys ebb and flow into one another is accentuated by the gentle dash of gold that instantly catches your eye. If you're looking for a way to add a focal point to the guest bedroom, gold holds all the answers. By turning your window spaces into a piece of modern art, you can solve the old problem of deciding on a style that a dozen different guests will love.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout), Yellow - Loft Blind
products.description: Made from tight woven pvc fabric, these blackout skylight blinds are perfect for your bathroom or rooms with a lot of humidity. With many great colours to choose from, you can easily find something to suit your bathroom decor. Our skylight blinds are ideal for your velux, fakro, rooflite and dakstra windows - all you need to do is choose a design and confirm your window manufacturer and window code (please note that these blinds are not manufactured by velux).

products.title: Seaside, Vintage - Roman Blind
products.description: The coastal vibe is bang on trend, and the seaside vintage takes the look to a new level, swapping classic blue tones for muted yellows and washed out reds. And the end result? A stunningly coloured and beautifully illustrated roman blind with just a hint of the extraordinary about it. Theme your guest bedroom with a nautical vibe, surrounding the vintage with coolest blue or ice white walls, using the reds and yellows found in the blind to give the look some warmth with bedding, cushions, and wall art.

products.title: Helix, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: The helix gold offers true contemporary style, with clean lines and soft colours forming a modern take on a floral patterning. A gentle golden tone mixes with a muted blue which, sat on top of their ivory grey background, provides this roman blind with a subtle canvas of understated colour. Use the gold to offer just a hint of colour to a downstairs cloakroom or utility room, where its softness won't overwhelm the small size of the room, yet will give some personality to this plain space.

products.title: Sicily, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: The diamond embossed sicily gold features a muted golden cloth interjected with a glossy gold thread and pops of camel chenille-feel fabric. The result is a feeling of pure luxury and grandeur, further enhanced by the resplendent folds of the roman style. The gold would work beautifully in a grand living room or dining room, but why not forget convention and use this lush blind in the bathroom instead? Incorporate it into a traditional victorian look by teaming with deep blue walls, a roll-top, claw-foot bath, and dark wooden floors.

products.title: Capri, Yellow - Roman Blind
products.description: If you're looking for something bold, bright, and just a little bit tropical, then you'll find it in the capri yellow, where a sunny yellow forms the base for gorgeous fuchsias, pale sky blues, and lush lime greens, tempered by the occasional gentle taupe, charcoal black, and soft white. Give the yellow pride of place by hanging in a contemporary living room. Keep the bases of the room, such as the walls and floor, neutral and unobtrusive, adding pale grey or taupe sofas, and accessorise with one or two of the brighter tones from the blind.

products.title: Corsica, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: The corsica range is one filled with class and sophistication, without giving up its traditional floral roots. The gold offers this pretty floral pattern in a golden yellow and parchment grey, resulting in a stunningly understated feel all over. Give the gold a home in your living room or guest bedroom, where the subtle yellow tone will add a hint of cheer without overwhelming the room. Surround with greys and similar shades of yellow for a coordinated look, opting for silver fittings and fixtures, and perhaps the occasional ornament or oddment.

products.title: Kershaw, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: The kershaw gold features a neutral blend of soft golds and gentle greys in the form of contemporary florals on a golden oatmeal background. The outcome is one of modern traditionalism, with an understated yet pretty effect that will suit any home. Use the gold as a subtle feature in a hallway or landing, where you might not want to overpower a smaller space but would like to add some interest and definition.

products.title: Emperor, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: Transform an unadorned part of the home with the alluring and glowing emperor in gold, made from a silky thread and chiffon-style cloth, which forms into a luxury blind with ribbed texture to create elegant style with little effort. Mingle the gold with oatmeal, ivory, and golden hues to craft a sophisticated scheme with depth and elegance, adding sumptuous linen and sheer fabrics to complement the metallic sheen of the blind.

products.title: Rocco, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: Produce a striking and sophisticated look with the rocco in gold, where plush thread meets fine cotton for a rich and plump blind with a cosy, downy texture, and incorporates a modern design with traditional style in opulent gold and biscuit hues. Blend this splendid and original design with alike textured cloths and plush fabrics in ivory and silk tones for an elegant and welcoming palette, including gilded accessories and eye-catching oddments in distinctive burnished gold to create an ongoing and coherent theme.

products.title: Selva, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: Featuring a gorgeous, chenille-textured fabric in mustard gold, and a country-woven thread in homely cream, the selva gold is classic and conventional. The thick, lustrous cloth is durable and hardwearing, as well as warm and cosy, giving this blind both form and function. Provide your dining room with a subtle touch of grandeur by surrounding the gold with a plush, textured wallpaper in matching cream and camel.

products.title: Roller, 4073 Bright Yellow - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Fully integrated into the roof window. For an additional charge, this blind is available with a solar powered remote control switch. With no mains electricity or wiring required, blind operation is made simple through the use of a pre-paired, wall mounted remote control switch - ideal for out of reach windows or for a touch of convenience.

products.title: Flying Pleated, 1271 Sunny Yellow - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Opaqueinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1271 sunny yellow - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.

products.title: Flying Pleated, 1263 Metallic Gold - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Softens the incoming light. Offers both privacy and good looks. Opaqueinstall in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Not fixed to bottom or top - allowing 100% flexibility. Flying pleated, 1263 metallic gold - velux loft blind softens the incoming light.

products.title: Venetian, 7056 Spingled Gold - Velux Loft Blind
products.description: Control amount and direction of incoming light and shadows. Water and stain resistant - well suited for bathrooms and kitchens. Install in minutes with the velux pick & click system. Venetian, 7056 spingled gold - velux loft blind control amount and direction of incoming light and shadows.

products.title: Natura, Gold - Vista Blind
products.description: When you combine modern design with the timeless elegance of natural patterning you can create something special. Natura gold introduces a finely detailed fabric that speaks to the effortless way shade and tone interplay in wood. Perfect for the uplifting touch you have been looking for. It also serves as the ideal companion for the elegant and breezy nature of the voile which hangs exactly how you want it.
